title: Victoria Beckham lifts lid on sex life with ‘soulmate’ David
text:
Victoria Beckham lifted the lid on her sex life with David (Picture: Rex)

Victoria Beckham has lifted the lid on her sex life with husband David, and we’re living for it all.

The Spice Girls star made a brief appearance on The View, where she opened up about her 20-year marriage with the 44-year-old.

Side note: How has it been that long?

Opening up about their romance, the 45-year-old was asked what first attracted her to the former Manchester United footballer, with whom she shares children Brooklyn, Romeo, Cruz, and Harper.

‘Obviously he’s incredibly good looking,’ she told the panel. ‘But David is the most wonderful husband and fantastic father, a real inspiration to all of us. He’s hard-working.

‘I’m lucky to have him as my soulmate.’

And Vic got a little hot under the collar when Joy Behar joked that the sex can sometimes be ‘eh’ when you’ve been with someone after ‘many years together’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Defending their sex life, the fashion designer insisted: ‘Don’t worry about that!’

The couple recently celebrated their massive marriage milestone by sharing a string of throwbacks from their wedding day on Instagram.

As you do.

But, in a candid chat about their relationship, Victoria admitted she feared for their marriage at points.

In fact, ahead of a romantic getaway, she worried they would be sat in silence without their children there to join them.

‘I said to David, “God, what will we have to say to each other when it’s just us?”

‘But we talked and laughed the whole time, and not even about the kids or work.’

The Wannabe singer also explained the England ace was constantly mocking her.

‘He’s better at sending me up,’ she added to the Telegraph. ‘But hey, what a relief – we’ll be ok, even when they’ve [their children] all left home.’
